law.catch_line: A salesperson may not represent more than 2 contractors at a time....

text.section: A salesperson may not represent more than 2 contractors at a time.

Before an individual becomes a salesperson for a contractor, the individual shall tell:
that contractor the name of each other contractor for whom the individual currently is a salesperson; and
each contractor for whom the individual currently is a salesperson the name of the contractor for whom the individual plans to become a salesperson.
When an individual ceases to be a salesperson for a contractor, the contractor shall give the Commission written notice of the cessation.
